Class AIMLMap

java.lang.Object

          org.alicebot.ab.AIMLMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
public class AIMLMap
extends java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>

implements AIML Map A map is a function from one string set to another. Elements of the domain are called keys and elements of the range are called values.

See Also:
Serialized Form
